title: Male and Female Laughing SFX
description: Immerse your projects with our Male and Female Laughing SFX library.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Immerse your projects with our Male and Female Laughing SFX library, a comprehensive collection featuring 6 voice actors designed to enhance the authenticity and emotional impact of your audio. This premium library offers over 200 high-quality, game-ready laughter sound files, capturing a diverse range of expressions and intensities. Whether you're developing NPC characters that need laugh emotes for video games or creating memorable moments for social media memes, this premium library delivers the perfect laugh every time.


  • 201 male & female audio voice files
  • 245.8 MBof voice samples
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format
  • 6 voice actors - four females and two male


The Male and Female Laughing SFX library is perfect for a wide range of applications. In video games, it enhances NPC interactions and adds dynamic laugh emotes to characters. For film and television, these sounds bring humor to comedic scenes and help define character personalities. Animators will find the laughter adds life and personality to their creations, while content creators can use it to elevate memes and videos on social media. In advertising, the library helps craft memorable and positive impressions, and in VR and AR, it boosts immersion. Additionally, it’s valuable for training simulations, creating realistic environments for diverse scenarios.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and organized into clear categories to simplify navigation with understandable folder structures: Evil Laughs, Creepy Laughs, Fake Laughs, Giggling Laughs, Hysterical Laughter, Insidious Laughs, and Regular Laughs. On top of UCS compliance, the Male and Female Laughing SFX library features extensive metadata embedded in the files using Soundminer, helping you find the right sound at the right time.


Product details:

  • 201 male & female audio voice files
  • 245.8 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44bit/16k .wav file format
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • 6 voice actors - four females and two male
  • A Variety of Laughter Styles
  • Evil Laughs: Perfect for villains and dark characters.
  • Creepy Laughs: Ideal for horror and suspense scenes.
  • Fake Laughs: Add a touch of insincerity and humor.
  • Giggling Laughs: Light-hearted and playful for comedic moments.
  • Hysterical Laughter: Capturing extreme joy and madness.
  • Insidious Laughs: For those sinister and cunning characters.
  • Regular Laughs: Natural and genuine for everyday scenes.
  • All Royalty Free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
